channel.title: Vistex v7 - Flawless Switches | Perfect Curses | Nex | FFA Minigame + MORE!
channel.description:
[size=20pt][b]FAN OF VISTEX? CHECK OUT OUR CURRENT PROJECT:[/b][/size] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,621367.msg4249978.html#msg4249978]Lost Legacy[/url]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2i8y9l3.png[/img]
[U][B]Why I am releasing:[/B][/U]
I have lost all motivation what so ever to host / own a server anymore so I am going to release. I am most likely done with RsPs. I want to give credits to a few people that really really helped me out. And my gf is a meany so I must release <.<
[U][B]Honorable Mentions:[/B][/U]
[URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/reader/"]Stefano[/URL] - My good friend and hoster. We have been through a lot, and even though he pissed me the love off I never regretted meeting him. [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/eliminate/"]Aj[/URL] - Ah this dude is amazing. Always inspired me to keep going. <3 [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/oliver+sykes/"]Frank[/URL] - Even tho he was annoying as love, I will always love this dude<3 [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/%27jerba/"]Connor[/URL] - Good friend. Helped me with some fixes and shit. Not to mention a cool guy =]
[B][U]Notes:[/U][/B]
* I will not be helping anyone with anything regarding to this. * Vistex is officially shut down. Sorry for everyone that was a player. * If you want to get in touch with me PM your skype. I do not use MSN
[U][B]Media / Content / Features:[/B][/U]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/dme49j.png[/img]
[COLOR="Blue"][I]Vistex may be looked upon as a ordinary server. However this is far from the actual truth, Vistex unlike many servers, is a created for the players. We strive on creating the 'Perfect' server.
We know and understand that the players come first before anything which is why we are always open to suggestions. Our friendly and helpful staff will be there to assist you throughout your stay at Vistex.
Vistex is not just a 'game' but a place to relax and enjoy yourself. We try our absolute best on having a fun and safe environment. We believe that everyone should treated the same no matter what. We are all strong. We are all confident. We are all Vistex.[/I][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mg2jb9.png[/img]
Features:
-All Weapon Specials 100% -100% Overloads -PERFECT Switching -Near Perfect Combat -Free For All Minigame -100% Animated Nex -100% Animated Nomad -100% Animad Jad -100% Corporeal Beast -Pk Title Shops -Donator Crown Support -All Pvp Armours & Weapons 100% -All Nex Armours 100% With Effect -No Lag -VPS Hosted -Custom Interfaces -Symbols (<>^\) Support -Better graphics -Player Clipping -NPC Clipping -Spawn Tab -Interactive Quest Tab -All Dungeoneering Items + Effects -Spawn Server -Much More!
[URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DyFBHZsajkY&feature=channel&list=UL"]Vistex Sneak Peek[/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XzW5i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BjRLN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iLKoT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/43QS4.png[/img]
[B][U] Developers:[/U][/B] Me - Source & Client Stefano - Source
[b][u]Credits:[/u][/b] Myself Stefano Connor - Help Aj - Help, Motivation, & Being Awesome<3 Frank - GFX Related stuff Rune-Server Community - Help & Support
[B][U]Download Links:[/U][/B]
Source & Client: http://uppit.com/b7g4hidaryty/Working_Vistex_V7.rar
Cache: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?g68jci6m8d6n66n]http://www.mediafire.com/?g68jci6m8d6n66n[/url]
[B][U]Credits:[/U][/B]
Aj Stefano Connor frank It's Just Me Rune-Server MoparScape
Anyone else who helped

item.dc:creator: @apocalypsePK apocalypsePK
item.description:
@apocalypsePK wrote:

a fix for the client run

@echo off title Vistex Client color B cd Flow echo Checking Java JDK 30..... - Omar/Flow "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_17\bin\java.exe" -Xmx300m ShowMessageDialog echo Checking Java JDK 25..... - Stefano/Reader "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" -Xmx300m ShowMessageDialog pause

by program files add a space then (x86) and your version… make sure urs is x86 first if not then ur screwed lol but honestly common sense

Read full topic
item.source: Vistex v7 - Flawless Switches | Perfect Curses | Nex | FFA Minigame + MORE!
